effect.name: VR360 Wrap
effect.description: Stretches a section of the equirectangular panorama to cover the entire VR sphere
effect.author: Leo Sutic

parameter.name: Top
parameter.comment: Degrees from the center of the image to keep unchanged

parameter.name: Bottom
parameter.comment: Degrees from the center of the image to keep unchanged

parameter.name: Left
parameter.comment: Degrees from the center of the image to keep unchanged

parameter.name: Right
parameter.comment: Degrees from the center of the image to keep unchanged

parameter.name: Blur start
parameter.comment: Horizontal fraction of the unchanged area to blur over in the equator band

parameter.name: Blur end
parameter.comment: Horizontal fraction of the unchanged area to blur over at the poles
